question: Watching educational programmes on the internet?
answer:
QUESTION

PLZ INFORM US IF WE R ALLOWED TO WATCH PROGRAMME(EDUCATIONAL) ON THE INTERNET.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

It is permissible to watch educational programs on the internet as long as there are no animate objects shown on the screen and there is no music played in the background.

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Ml. Abu Yahya,
Student Darul Iftaa
